import React, { useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../resources/components/Navbar"; import Cards from "../resources/components/Cards"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; const Description = () => { const locationn = useLocation(); const [post, setPost] = useState({}); const path = locationn.pathname.split("/")[2]; const [role, setRole] = useState(""); const [company, setCompany] = useState(""); const [location, setLocation] = useState(""); const [experience, setExperience] = useState(""); const [desc, setDesc] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { const getPost = async () => { const res = await axios.get("/posts/" + path); setPost(res.data); setRole(res.data.role); setCompany(res.data.company); }; getPost(); }, [path]); return ( <>
Frontend Developer - React.js/TypeScript

Microsoft - Noida - 2-4 Years

Posted on : 22-04-23

Frontend Developer : ABOUT EMBIBE : Welcome to the future of education! : At Embibe, we have just one mission - to truly personalise education. Because every child deserves it. This has led us to embark on this noblest of journeys to deliver life and learning outcomes for every student! Rooted in consumer behaviour, we are leveraging AI and Data Science to deliver personalised achievement journeys for every student. We are a tribe of intellectually fierce people from diverse backgrounds, focused on building cutting-edge products that empower everyone in the education ecosystem - students, teachers, educational institutes and parents. We enable a deeper understanding of student behaviour, their strengths and weaknesses through analysis at a granular level. It is this shared vision of democratising and personalising education that unites us all. In 2018, Reliance Jio partnered with Embibe to propel our collective vision of democratising education and impacting a billion lives. The Jio-Embibe Partnership has brought unrivalled acceleration to delivering learning outcomes to every corner of India via low-cost devices and high-speed Jio Internet connectivity. If you too want to see a future where every student achieves their full potential and want to play a part in changing the face of education, then lets talk! Embibe : AI Powered Personalised Adaptive Learning & Outcomes Platform 1 ABOUT THE JOB : We are looking for an experienced top-notch React. JS developer to grow with our dev team. As a React.js, Redux Developer, you will be involved from conception to completion with projects that are technologically sound and aesthetically impressive. WHAT YOU WILL DO : - You will develop the front-end for our products and collaborate with designers, other engineers, and product managers to build new features, iterate on current features, and build a world-class user experience. - Build responsive & re-usable UI components using ReactJS/ Typescript, React hooks, React Context API as per the specifications and guidelines - Maintain & manage the state of the application using Redux and be in sync with the server. Rapidly iterate prototypes based on design updates and new requirements. - You will build applications that are reliable, secure and optimised for performance across all environments - Write high-quality code - Build large scalable applications for cloud deployment - Build pixel-perfect UIs across both mobile platforms - Leverage native APIs for deep integrations with both platforms - Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance that feels native - Maintain code and write unit tests to ensure the product is of the highest quality - Develop server side rendered applications for low latency. - Develop an application that scores good on lighthouse(performance, accessibility, progressive web apps, SEO, etc.) - Take part in optimising the build process using build tools like webpack, babel etc. - Optimising application chunks for client side rendered applications using code splitting, tree shaking etc. to reduce unused JS and improve load time. WHAT YOU NEED TO BRING TO THE TABLE : - Bachelors in computer science or relevant fields - Strong sense of ownership - Attitude for getting things done - Understanding of basic Rest Principles - Familiar with project management tools like JIRA etc. - Will be involved in developing any enterprise systems like eCommerce, manufacturing, supply chain, etc. - Excellent understanding of performance and optimization techniques Embibe : AI Powered Personalised Adaptive Learning & Outcomes Platform 2 - Experience of working with Git - Ability to work in a fast-paced start-up environment. - Got what it takes to bring change to the world of education? Then get in touch! Embibe : AI Powered Personalised Adaptive Learning & Outcomes Platform 3

); }; export default Description;
